name: Kimple Dating
description:
THANK YOU 

EVERYONE FOR YOUR SUPPORT TO THE GAME

Kimple Dating is a short demo Visual Novel where a kittybot named Kimple will steal your heart.

Kimple Channel : https://www.twitch.tv/kimpleclone

Special thanks 

Magnusio who helped me to beautify many sentences.

Kimple who approved the game.

Credits song 

Patricklieberkind - distant sad piano

Reeder - 03 - warchmakers daughter

Ryan Andersen - 0 - Solitude
